item.title: In true roguelike fashion, Slay the Spire 2 is only being made because of a 50/50 coin flip - Rock Paper Shotgun
item.description:
1. In true roguelike fashion, Slay the Spire 2 is only being made because of a 50/50 coin flip  Rock Paper Shotgun
  2. 'We ended up flipping a coin': Slay the Spire devs left it up to pure chance whether they'd make a sequel or something else  PC Gamer
